description: The nationwide indefinite transport blockade, enforced by the BNP-led 20-party alliance, entered 10th day on Thursday. Vehicular movement in the capital was thin in the morning. Rail communications with Dhaka and other districts were normal. No long haul buses left the city or any entered. A large number of law enforcers remained deployed in different parts of the capital to fend off any trouble. (Countrywide: the 3 in the geoprecision indicates that the event was taking place all across Bangladesh) DAY 2
